name: archit-search
description: Intelligent architecture enforcement extension that combines real-time rule-based validation with AI-powered anomaly detection to prevent spaghetti code and maintain clean, scalable codebases.

architSearch.rules.markdownDescription: Define custom architecture rules for import restrictions. Each rule specifies source file patterns and disallowed import patterns.

source.description: Glob pattern for the source files (e.g., '**/pages/**').

disallow.description: List of patterns disallowed to be imported (e.g., ['**/database/**', '**/models/**']).

message.description: Custom warning message displayed when the rule is violated.

architSearch.layers.markdownDescription: Define ordered architecture layers. Lower layers in the list cannot import from upper layers, enforcing unidirectional dependencies.

name.description: Layer name for identification (e.g. Domain, Infrastructure, Presentation)

pattern.description: Glob pattern matching files in this layer (e.g. '**/domain/**')

architSearch.maxImports.markdownDescription: Maximum number of imports allowed per file. Files exceeding this threshold trigger a 'High Coupling' warning, indicating potential God Object anti-pattern.

architSearch.enforceEncapsulation.markdownDescription: When enabled, warns when importing internal module files directly instead of using the module entry point (index.js or index.ts). Promotes proper module encapsulation.

architSearch.checkCycles.markdownDescription: When enabled, detects and warns about direct circular dependencies (A imports B, B imports A). Essential for preventing tightly coupled code.

architSearch.enableAI.markdownDescription: Enable AI Semantic Analysis engine to detect suspicious dependencies based on conceptual mismatch and statistical anomalies.

enumDescriptions: ภาษาไทย - Thai language support
architSearch.language.markdownDescription: Select the language for all extension messages, status bar, and sidebar UI elements. Changes take effect immediately without reload.

architSearch.checkDeepCycles.markdownDescription: Enable deep circular dependency detection. Finds multi-level cycles like A → B → C → A, not just direct A ↔ B cycles.

architSearch.deepCycleMaxDepth.markdownDescription: Maximum depth to search for circular dependencies. Higher values detect deeper cycles but may impact performance.

architSearch.detectUnusedImports.markdownDescription: When enabled, detects and warns about imports that are declared but not used in the file.

architSearch.showMetricsInSidebar.markdownDescription: Display file metrics (Maintainability Index, Instability, Coupling) in the sidebar panel.

architSearch.autoExportReport.markdownDescription: Automatically export architecture report when the project is analyzed. Reports are saved to the workspace root.

enumDescriptions: JSON - Machine-readable format for CI/CD integration
HTML - Visual report with styled dashboard
architSearch.reportFormat.markdownDescription: Default format for exported architecture reports.
